quotes.t: I took up the two officers in my hands, put them first into my coat-pockets, and then into every other pocket about me, except my two fobs, and another secret pocket I had no mind should be searched, wherein I had some little {qword}necessaries{/qword} that were of no consequence to any but myself.

"I thoroughly understand you," cried Mrs. Norris, " … My dear Sir Thomas, with all my faults I have a warm heart; and, poor as I am, would rather deny myself the {qword}necessaries{/qword} of life than do an ungenerous thing."
